clean_data: Front EndUI Developer span lFrontspan span lEndspanUI span lDeveloperspan Front EndUI Developer The Home Depot Over 6 years of experience in the IT industry working with Web Based Applications and UI applications in various domains like Financial Life Insurance and Health Care Well versed with complete Software Development Life Cycle SDLC process with expertise in Planning Reviewing Specification Documentation Scheduling Design Development Testing Implementation and Maintenance of applications Extensive experience in designing professional UI web applications using front end technologies like HTML5 DHTML CSS3 JavaScript XML DHTML XHTML JQuery AJAX JSON Flash and Hybrid Web Development Extensive experience in Crossbrowser HTML5 CSS3 JavaScript coding to offer responsive website layouts to modern browsers and mobile devices Experience in design and development of various web and enterprise applications using J2EE technologies like JSP Servlets JDBCJMS Spring MVC Hibernate Struts Web Services Java Script and HTML Experience applying the latest development approaches including MVC eventdriven applications using AJAX Object Oriented OO Java Script JQuery Object Oriented Design JSON and XML Experience in using the JavaScript frameworks JQUERY Angularjs Backbonejs ReactJS Nodejs Twitter Bootstrap Extensive knowledge in developing applications in a single page SPAs using various JavaScript frameworks like SAAS AngularJS24 BackboneJS KnockoutJS and NodeJS ExpressJS Experience in designing web applications employing Search Engine Optimization SEO techniques and Search Engine Strategies SES Working experience with Responsive Web Design Strong experience with JQuery JQuery plugins Validator Drag and Drop AutoComplete AJAX Dynamic HTML DHTML and JSON Experience on working with CSS Background CSS Layouts CSS positioning CSS text CSS border CSS margin CSS padding CSS table Pseudo classes Pseudo elements and CSS behaviors in CSS Experience in designing UI patterns and UI applications with the help of Adobe products like Adobe Dreamweaver CS3 Adobe Photoshop CS3CS4 Adobe Fireworks CS3 and Adobe Illustrator CS3 Good Understanding of Document Object Model DOM and DOM Functions Expertise in Client Side designing and validations using HTML DHTML and Java Script Hands on Experience developing SOAP and REST web services in Java using JERSEY and APACHE CXF Skilled at analyzing and solving browser compatibility challenges and possesses ability to maintain consistency and well commented HTML and CSS markup Experience with Firebug for Mozilla and IE Developer Toolbar for Internet Explorer Having good administration experience in maintaining Atlassian products like JIRA Confluence Fisheye Bamboo Crowd etc Experienced working in both AGILE and Waterfall based development environment and participating in SCRUM sessions Excellent knowledge in the development of User Experience web and mobile based applications Have good communication skills to discuss the projects with technical and nontechnical SMEs Excellent analytical and logical programming skills with a good understanding at the conceptual level and possess excellent presentation interpersonal skills with a strong desire to achieve specified goals Work Experience Front EndUI Developer The Home Depot Austin TX January 2018 to Present Austin TX Jan 2018 Present The Home Depot is an American Home Improvement supplies retailing company that sells tools construction product and services Role Front EndUI Developer Responsibilities Contribution Front End Transformation FET physical redesign of Front End across mainline service desk pro and garden that includes new selfcheckout hardware and more selfcheckout machines SCO Refresh replace legacy SCO lanes with new hardware solution outside of the FET stores to be completed by end of FY2018 Worked on React JS for building encapsulated components to pass rich data through app and keep state out of the DOM For the data communication between various components used Input output directives and shared services Designed the front end applications user interactive UI web pages using web technologies like HTML5 XHTML and CSS Authored REST based Web API wrappers to integrate with conventional Web Services Extensively used services to access data required for the UI components Defined security policies and enforced HTTP and SOAP securities Used ReactRouter to turn application into Single Page Application worked on various face of testing Unit test Snapshots tests for react components test Automation end to end test with Gherkin Cucumber Designed and developed ReactJS component required for the project Testing the website on multiple browsers with their old as well as latest release Coded extensively using JavaScript MVC Framework and AngularJS to make rich internet web application for a Single page app Worked closely with SQA team in fixing the reported bugsdefects and checking cross platform compatibility Contribution on working Thd Vault system connect with the new Self check out recycler Created the Application using ReactJS and Nodejs libraries NPM gulp directories to generate desired view and flux to root the URLs properly The Vault Balancing System provides functionality to manage vault tasks This includes issuing and balancing tills for register and self checkout managing the bank deposit and balancing the vault Developed enterpriselevel JAVA applications utilizing XML JSON Restfulbased web servicesHTML Angular JS Javascript and Bootstrap Responsible for creating RESTFUL Web Services to serve data to the front end application in JSON format Testing the website on multiple browsers with their old as well as latest release Environment JQuery Javascript Nodejs Reactjs bootstrapjs Oracle PL SQL JDBC coherence Mongo DB REST Eclipse Weblogic Junit Agile UML JSP Java Server Pages Standard Tag Library JSTL SERVLET MAVEN ITEXT Jasper report Front EndWebUI Developer Capital One Financial Corporation Rolling Meadows IL May 2016 to December 2018 is a US based bank holding company specializing in credit cards home loans auto loans bankings and savings products Role Front EndWebUI Developer Responsibilities Closely worked with business system analyst to understand the requirements to ensure that right set of UI modules been built Wrote application level code to perform client side validation using JQUERY and JavaScript Designed the front end applications user interactive UI web pages using web technologies like HTML5 XHTML and CSS Authored REST based Web API wrappers to integrate with conventional Web Services Coded extensively using JavaScript MVC Framework and AngularJS to make rich internet web application for a Single page app Coded dynamic and browser compatible UI web pages using JavaScript CSS3 HTML5 JQuery Ajax and responsive design in MVC environment Utilized java EclipseJ2EE Tested programing code Applications Collaborated with team and management Prepared unit test cases and reviewing test result Designed and Developed front end using JSP and JSTL Created maintained a centralized repository of UI components participated in usability testing research Using advanced level of JQUERY AJAX JavaScript CSS and pure CSS layouts Worked on creating responsive website for smart devices using Responsive Web design and media queries Coded Java Script for page functionality and Light box plugins using JQUERY Involved in building Single Page Application SPA using MVC Angular JS framework and Angular UI Created Single Page Application with loading multiple views using route services and adding more user experience to make it more dynamic by using Angular JS framework Created Images Logos and Icons that are used across the web pages using Adobe Flash and Photoshop Created and developed the webpage layout and positioneddeveloped design elements using Dreamweaver HTML and Adobe Photoshop Redesigned pages to improve application design and UI to attract the customers by taking inputs from senior management Wrote JQUERY function while implementing various UI Screens across the whole web application both consumer facing as well as internal application Worked extensively on twoway oneway data binding builtin components and developed single page applications using Angular JS Used Bootstrap responsives CSS to adjust to phones tablets and desktops Produced content pages with CSS3 layout and style markup presentations and also used JavaScript methods and properties Used Dojo Components and integrating back end applications with AJAX driven web 20 front end using OO JavaScript framework Involved in AgileSCRUM based approach to UI Development Creating crossbrowser compatible and standardscompliant CSSbased page layouts Worked on cross browser compatibility issues and fix the bugs pertaining to various browsers Define technical requirements based upon business requirements Maintain enhance and recommend solutions that best suit business and technology needs from UI standpoint Environment HTML5 CSS3 JavaScript JQUERYAngular JS Bootstrap Responsive Web Design competitiveness and efficiency I was involved in a project to develop a customer service representative tool for different clients with particular variances set up to them to access a website through which clients can access their users data and provide them optimistic solutions Role Java UIWeb Developer Responsibilities Worked extensively on design and development of UX UI HTML CSS and JQuery Worked with complete redesigns of a daily events website and focused on improving readability utility and overall UX Worked on Angular JS and also on JavaScript HTML5 CSS3 in the front end development Designed and Developed User Interactive UI of Web pages with the help of HTML5 HTML CSS3 CSS JavaScript JQuery Angularjs Bootstrap and AJAX Worked closely with back end developers to find ways to push the limits of existing Web technology in service of creating the best possible user experience Created various interactive plugins widgets or design UIUX Developed AngularJS components such as controllers Services filters models and used Httpservice for rest service invocation Design User Interface for the project using HTML5 CSS3 and Flash Used JQuery to develop user interface widgets Worked with Nodejs JavaScript library with a REST full JSON interface Detailed understanding of DOM and DOM functions Used JSON objects effectively for efficient client side coding Used CSS selectors for condition based styling and pseudoclasses to add some special effects to selectors Involved in developmentconversion of numerous existing UI screens to Angular JS for the Admin and Task UI modules Contributed as key resource of the Angular JS Framework Team in conversion of existing XMI UI screens of the application to Angular JS based UI Proficiency in implementing the design to meet web standards W3C SEO and worked on various browsers like IE Firefox Chrome and Opera for crossbrowser implementation Followed agile methodology and iteration planning Creating framework for ATDD test automation practices Developed Web API using NodeJS and hosted on multiple load balanced API instances Developed backend web services using Nodejs and stored dependencies using Node Package Manager NPM Designed and Implement the GUI changes using Swing Panels JSP components and JSF Used CSS selectors for condition based styling and pseudoclasses to add some special effects to selectors Successfully configured managed the Internet Information Server IIS which handles the project Developed JavaScript library for rendering domainspecific layout XML to the web Configured Git and maven plugins in Jenkins server Documented design solutions and implemented according to the design Environment HTML5 CSS3 JavaScript JQuery Angularjs Nodejs Bootstrap Dreamweaver CS5 AJAX JSON ECLIPSE MS
